title: Delightful and surprising: dawn to dusk beneath the bird feeder – in pictures
description:
A former comedian and ventriloquist, Carla Rhodes’ life was transformed when she discovered a passion for wildlife conservation photography. Last winter, she placed a camera trap in her garden in the Catskill mountains in New York, with heartwarming results

Continue reading...

title: Eternal innovator: Richard Rogers' 10 best buildings – in pictures
description:
From a glass home with movable walls to an airport so stunning you’ll want to be delayed, Richard Rogers, who has died aged 88, turned architecture inside-out. We pick his finest creations
